row.process:
cd &PATH_PSQL_BIN#
echo select \* from AH where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\' order by ah_timestamp1 desc\; > &SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\'\; >> /&SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH_CLEANED where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\'\; >> &SQL_FILE# echo &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/psql -e "host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# password='&MY_PASSWORD#'" &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/psql -e "host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# password='&MY_PASSWORD#'" < &SQL_FILE# rc=$?
exit $rc
